website_summaries.verdict: The Oculus Rift Earphones are a pricey, proprietary in-ear alternative to the headphones that come with the Oculus Rift headset.
pros: Installs securely to the Oculus Rift headset
cons: Can't work with any other device
Expensive given the limited usage possibilities

customer_reviews.title: over priced, wires way to short
customer_reviews.text: everytime you take headset up to see the real world the earplugs fall out. For a safety reason I would not use these alone in a house. They really do block everything out. So no vision or hearing is a big no no. The wires SHOULD be thicker and a few centimeters longer. Shame Headset didn't come with standard headphone jack as even pound land headphones have the same cheap wires as these. Unless you REALLY want total immersion best to stick to the over head ones that came with the headset. Much comfier and dont take ages to keep refitting to your ears. The sound quality is acceptable.. Sounds same as most £20 plus headphones nothing exciting
customer_reviews.author: Tangobaldy

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the over-ears ones supplied with the Rift
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the over-ears ones supplied with the Rift. Only two minor issues - first the immersion goes up another notch so you wont't hear your other half creeping up behind you, or calling for dinner; and second not really for sharing due to hygiene.
customer_reviews.author: Wood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to the headset!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great addition to the Oculus Rift headset. I mainly got them because they block out all external sound - they do an excellent job. The sound quality is great for earphones but don't expect the same quality as from full over ear cans. The experience is much more immersive and they don't leak too much sound. Really easy to install using the tool provided (the tool also comes in the oculus box). Overall, although a bit pricey, definitely recommended if you don't want to hear any outside noise while playing games/watching movies and want a more immersive experience!
customer_reviews.author: M.C

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t think there’d be much difference...
customer_reviews.text: But how wrong I was! I love my Oculus Rift especially with Assetto Corsa. The sound from the built in headphones/speakers is very good. However, put these on and it’s a whole new experience. The outside world completely disappears and all that’s left is you in your virtual world. The sound quality is very very good too. I use the middle size buds and they are so comfortable. Totally recommend these to anyone who loves their Rift. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: G. Dunsmuir

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: One of the original Rift earphones starting crackling so I came across these. Much better overall, good sound that IMO surpasses the original headphones.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Better than the standard headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Great earphones, a lot better than the standard headphones you get with the rift. Great fit and really gets you into the game.
customer_reviews.author: Ronan Frew

customer_reviews.title: Buy these if you have a rift!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, superior to the slides headphones which come as standard. Should make your oculus last longer.
customer_reviews.author: macmockery

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Makes my rift more immersive, blocks out external sounds and more comfort than it looks, also It's really easy to put in.
customer_reviews.author: Natwestc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality. Bass and treble well balanced. Far better than standard headphones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sound better then the over ear ones for full immersion
customer_reviews.author: A. Parkes

customer_reviews.title: ... months now and the sound quality to me is great - I'm no audiophile though so look for another ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had these headphones for 3 months now and the sound quality to me is great - I'm no audiophile though so look for another review if you care more about that. They are able to muffle external sound and for me that was a necessity. I wasn't able to fully feel immersed and thought I'd try these headphones and they've worked perfectly. I still never feel fully immersed like some people can be (usually in videos) but it's much better than before. As a side note, they are incredibly comfy and I forget they're in my ears for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: No bass compared to regular Rift headset
customer_reviews.text: While they feel very comfortable, they have a really tinny sound compared to the regular Rift headset, no noticeable bass at all. Unfortunately while I was researching if my set is defective or if others have the same issue, my Amazon return window has expired so I am stuck with this waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: fcf

customer_reviews.title: Sound degrades with time
customer_reviews.text: Sound started dying out after 2 months of use. Left ear very quiet, right ear louder but not even close to the volume it should be. It's a shame because they made VR much more immersive and I took care of them also cleaned them.
customer_reviews.author: Almondo
